  • Constructor Details

    • CIT2

      public CIT2​(java.lang.String name, CIT2_Generator generator_set, int left_AES, int right_AES, double shifting_step)
      Constructor for the CIT2 fuzzy set.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the set
      generator_set - The T1 generator set used to generate the CIT2 set
      left_AES - Number of AES at the left of the generator set i.e. the AES obtained by shifting the generator set to the left
      right_AES - Number of AES at the right of the generator set i.e. the AES obtained by shifting the generator set to the right
      shifting_step - distance between the AES

    • CIT2

      public CIT2​(java.lang.String name, CIT2_Generator generator_set, double shifting_step)
      Constructor for the CIT2 fuzzy set. Equivalent to CIT2(name, generator_set, 1, 1 shifting_step)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the set
      generator_set - The T1 generator set used to generate the CIT2 set
      shifting_step - Distance between the generator set and the leftmost/rightmost AES

      name - name of the plot
      sets - CIT2 sets to plot
      xAxisRange - range (over the x-axis) of the values to plot
      discretizationLevel - discretization level to use to plot the sets
